meanings.definition: The act of registering in advance.
meanings.sent1: Many students completed their preregistrations for the new semester.
meanings.sent2: Online preregistrations for the workshop are now open.
meanings.sent3: The preregistrations for the dance competition filled up faster than expected.
meanings.sent4: Her meticulous preregistrations ensured she got into all her desired classes.
meanings.sent5: The preregistrations for the conference were so popular that they had to add extra seats.

meanings.definition: The process of signing up for an event or service before it takes place.
meanings.sent1: Early preregistrations for the concert received a special discount.
meanings.sent2: Preregistrations for the charity run exceeded expectations.
meanings.sent3: His last-minute preregistrations caused a bit of chaos at the event.
meanings.sent4: The preregistrations for the summer camp were like a race to secure a spot.
meanings.sent5: Preregistrations for the webinar were so high that they had to upgrade the server capacity.
